text.config.infinicraft-config.title: Infinicraft
text.config.infinicraft-config.option.IN: URL of a functioning Infinicraft server. Default is https://localhost:17707
text.config.infinicraft-config.option.SE: Seconds before a request times out:
Infinicraft will wait for the Infinicraft server to respond with an for this many seconds before giving up.
text.config.infinicraft-config.option.SH: Show description of custom items in tooltip.
Show recipe of custom items in tooltip.
